starfleet_message: To Captain Picard, USS Enterprise-D: A distress call has been received from a Federation science station orbiting Epsilon IV.
mission_description: Investigate the distress call and ensure the safety of the science team.

dialogue_tree.line: Commander Riker: Captain, Starfleet reports: A distress call has been received from a Federation science station orbiting Epsilon IV. Shall we proceed to investigate the distress call and ensure the safety of the science team.?

options.label: Set course and engage at warp 6
options.crew_reply: Helm: 'Course laid in, engaging warp drive.'

options.label: Request further data from Starfleet
options.crew_reply: Lt. Commander Data: 'Additional telemetry incoming, Captain.'

options.label: Assemble senior staff for briefing
options.crew_reply: Riker: 'Aye, sir. Briefing in ten minutes.'

dialogue_tree.line: Data: I've analyzed the situation, Captain. The optimal course of action aligns with investigate the distress call and ensure the safety of the science team..

options.label: Prepare for possible confrontation
options.crew_reply: Worf: 'Shields at full power, weapons online.'

dialogue_tree.line: Lt. Worf: Captain, our sensors indicate potential complications ahead.

debriefs.text: Starfleet Command commends your decisive actions in completing the mission with honor.
The Enterprise-D’s performance has been exemplary; your leadership ensured mission success.
Federation interests are secure, and your actions are noted as a model for future operations.
Starfleet has expressed gratitude for your precision and adherence to protocol.
Mission accomplished flawlessly. All objectives have been completed without loss.
Starfleet regrets to report that mission objectives were only partially achieved.
Command expresses concern over the operational delays encountered during the mission.
The incident will be reviewed to prevent future procedural lapses.
Federation assets sustained avoidable risk; Starfleet will analyze mission conduct.
Mission failure acknowledged. Starfleet stresses the importance of improved readiness.

options.crew_reply: Lt. Commander Data: 'Additional telemetry incoming, Captain.'

options.label: Assemble senior staff for briefing
options.crew_reply: Riker: 'Aye, sir. Briefing in ten minutes.'

dialogue_tree.line: Data: I've analyzed the situation, Captain. The optimal course of action aligns with investigate the vessel and ensure it poses no threat..

options.label: Prepare for possible confrontation
options.crew_reply: Worf: 'Shields at full power, weapons online.'

dialogue_tree.line: Lt. Worf: Captain, our sensors indicate potential complications ahead.

debriefs.text: Starfleet Command commends your decisive actions in completing the mission with honor.
The Enterprise-D’s performance has been exemplary; your leadership ensured mission success.
Federation interests are secure, and your actions are noted as a model for future operations.
Starfleet has expressed gratitude for your precision and adherence to protocol.
Mission accomplished flawlessly. All objectives have been completed without loss.
Starfleet regrets to report that mission objectives were only partially achieved.
Command expresses concern over the operational delays encountered during the mission.
The incident will be reviewed to prevent future procedural lapses.
Federation assets sustained avoidable risk; Starfleet will analyze mission conduct.
Mission failure acknowledged. Starfleet stresses the importance of improved readiness.
